body:
Hey guys! As you may know a new newspaper has been born. We are having some trouble with the Advertisement page in our media section. If anyone would like to place an ad in this page please post a picture of what you would like the ad to be. If your one of the first people to post there ad, it will end up in The Avicadian Gazette Newspaper.


3/7 Ad Spots Taken. Book em' fast!
